Query:
SELECT 
    BUSINESSDATE,
    CHECKOPEN,
    CHECKCLOSE,
    CHECKID,
    CHECKDETAILID,
    ROUNDNUMBER,
    CHECKNUMBER,
    RVCNUMBER,
    RVCNAME,
    WORKSTATIONS,
    ORDERTYPEINDEX,
    ORDERTYPENAME,
    SERVINGPERIODNUMBER,
    SERVINGPERIODNAME,
    CHECKNAME,
    DININGTABLENAME,
    COVERS,
    PAYMENT,
    PAYMENTNOTES,
    MINUMBER,
    MIMASTERNAME,
    MIDEFNAME,
    FAMILYGROUPNUM,
    FAMILYGROUPNAME,
    MAJORGROUPNUM,
    MAJORGROUPNAME,
    SALESCOUNT,
    SALESTOTAL,
    COSTTOTAL,
    DISCOUNTTOTAL,
    SALESAFTERDISCOUNT,
    DISCOUNTNAMES,
    DISCOUNTNOTES,
    TAX,
    SERVICECHARGE,
    MICNUMBER,
    MICNAME,
    PRINTCLASSNUM,
    PRINTCLASSNAME,
    EMPNUMBER,
    EMPNAME,
    AUTHEMPNUMBER,
    AUTHEMPNAME
FROM 
    CUSTOMDB.SalesTable WHERE BUSINESSDATE >= @FROMDATE AND BUSINESSDATE <= @TODATE AND PAYMENT = 'OCENT'
